attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reverse the Governments decision to add an 8% increase in alcohol duty and to stop the sale of cheap alcohol in supermarkets.Supermarket selling below cost is the cause of binge drinking resulting in an increase in crime, violence and increasing pressure on the NHS and the Police. As publicans we control the consumption of alcohol in a controlled, licensed and safe environment. The very existance of one of the oldest, traditional trades in the country is now under serious threat of disappearing altogether. Putting thousands out of work across the UK
